Code.Name: Type 1 labelling
Code.Description: Type 1 labelling (ISO 14024) is an accepted evidence type from Procurement Directive art.44.

Code.Name: Type 2 labelling
Code.Description: Type 2 labelling (ISO 14021) is an accepted evidence type from Procurement Directive art.44.

Code.Name: Type 3 labelling
Code.Description: Type 3 labelling (ISO 14025) is an accepted evidence type from Procurement Directive art.44.

Code.Name: Certification
Code.Description: Certification is an accepted evidence type from Procurement Directive art.44.

Code.Name: Test report
Code.Description: Test report is an accepted evidence type from Procurement Directive art.44.

Code.Name: Other means of Proof
Code.Description: Other means of proof is an accepted evidence type from Procurement Directive art.44.

Code.Name: No proof
Code.Description: If item requirement do not have any means of proof use this evidence.
